resources.string: Enter your e-mail address and we\'ll send you a link to reset your password

If the order status has been ordered, you can cancel the order. However, if it has been processed, you cannot cancel the order.
The order has been canceled by the customer.
Orders in the process of making goods information data and placing goods in order to arrive at their destination.
Orders in the process of sending goods to their destination.
The order has arrived and is accepted by the customer.
